channel.title: Scar obfuscator and does anyone need a stats system?
channel.description:
obfuscator: http://www.impsoft.net/public/StripLines.zip
Tired of asking your users for progress reports? view source: http://www.impsoft.net/BOT_STATS/Stats_DB.php can be made to look like: http://www.impsoft.net/BOT_STATS/statistics2.php
Have you system stats data to my stats system. I will make a tut if a few are intrested. It is rather simple!

item.title: Scar obfuscator and does anyone need a stats system?
item.dc:creator: @SlavePwner SlavePwner
item.description:
@SlavePwner wrote:

realrune:

Yeah, the obfs worked sometimes, but then it didn’t work other times. I think the problem is that it tries to put too many letters on a line. It should have no more then 1000 letters on a line otherwise it makes it so scar can’t compile.

Then don’t make it obfs in 1 line…

Read full topic
item.source: Scar obfuscator and does anyone need a stats system?

@ruler wrote:

realrune:

Yeah, the obfs worked sometimes, but then it didn’t work other times. I think the problem is that it tries to put too many letters on a line. It should have no more then 1000 letters on a line otherwise it makes it so scar can’t compile.

nah the text area for scar lenght limit dosn’t limit the script buffer

you cna modify the obf to ot get rid of extra lines and sutff liek that to debug.
